resources.name: Enterprise Kong Admin API 0.0.2
resources.description:
OpenAPI 3.0 spec for Kong Gateway's Enterprise Admin API.

You can learn more about Kong Gateway at [docs.konghq.com](https://docs.konghq.com)
.Give Kong a star at [Kong/kong](https://github.com/kong/kong) repository.

body.text:
_format_version: "2.1"

services:
  - name: ms-insurance-api
    url: http://13.58.156.9/
    routes:
      - name: insurance-route
        paths:
          - /seguro
  - name: ms-loan-api
    url: http://34.28.74.155/
    routes:
      - name: loan-route
        paths:
          - /emprestimo
  - name: vasco-bank-autenticacao-api
    url: http://20.231.32.210:7004/
    routes:
      - name: autenticacao-route
        paths:
          - /autenticacao
  - name: user-service-api
    url: http://20.231.32.210:7005/
    routes:
      - name: user-route
        paths:
          - /usuario

plugins:
  - name: jwt
    route: insurance-route
    enabled: true
    config: 
      key_claim_name: kid
      claims_to_verify: 
        - exp
      secret_is_base64: true

  - name: jwt
    route: loan-route
    enabled: true
    config: 
      key_claim_name: kid
      claims_to_verify: 
        - exp
      secret_is_base64: true

  - name: jwt
    route: user-route
    enabled: true
    config: 
      key_claim_name: kid
      claims_to_verify: 
        - exp
      secret_is_base64: true

consumers:
  - username: kongGatewayGCP
    custom_id: "85467391"

jwt_secrets:
  - consumer: kongGatewayGCP
    algorithm: HS512
    secret: T0xIQSBTTyBWT0NFIFFVRSBjb2lzYSBtYWlzIGxlZ2FsIHNlZ3VyYXIgZXNzYSBiYXJyYSBxdWUggiBnb3N0YWRlIHZjISEhISE=
